price: I convey to you the messages of my Lord and give you sincere advice, and I know from Allah what you do not know.
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنصَحُ لَكُمۡ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
